title: Fix EventAgentMessage payload and ToolStartedData types
description:
Reviewer found two issues in adapter/claude/:
1. BUG: EventAgentMessage uses bare string as Data, which fails to round-trip through eventstore (string isn't an object, unmarshalData falls through to default). Fix: create AgentMessageData struct with Content field. Add case in eventstore unmarshalData.
2. Semantic mismatch: PreToolUse emits EventToolStarted with ToolCompletedData. Create ToolStartedData struct.
Also: fix HandleHookEvent to return false for unknown events. Add missing payload structs for other event types (TurnStarted, ApprovalRequested, SessionEnded).
Also: fix sessionlog.go partial-line issue (same as h2-5qi fix).
